    def convert_c_to_f(celcius_value):
    return celcius_value *9.0/5+32

    import fah_converter

print("enter a celcius value : ")

celcius = float(input())
fahrenheit = fah_converter.convert_c_to_f(celcius)
print("thats",fahrenheit,"degress farenheit")
